name: 3dkmeans
description: 3d+t Clustering segmentation based on The C clustering library.
author: AFNI Developers

inputs.name: Input data files
inputs.description: Input data to be clustered. You can specify multiple filenames in sequence and they will be concatenated internally.

inputs.name: Mask dataset
inputs.description: Dataset to be used as a mask; only voxels with nonzero values in 'mset' will be used.

inputs.name: Mask range
inputs.description: Restrict the voxels from 'mset' to only those mask values between 'a' and 'b' (inclusive).

inputs.name: Custom mask options
inputs.description: Execute the options enclosed in single quotes as a 3dcalc-like program to produce a mask from the resulting 3D brick.

inputs.name: Output job name
inputs.description: Specify a different name for the output files. Default is derived from the input file name.

inputs.name: Output prefix
inputs.description: Specify a prefix for the output volumes. Default is the same as jobname.

inputs.name: Distance measure for clustering
inputs.description: Specifies distance measure for clustering. Supported values: 0 (No clustering), 1 (Uncentered correlation distance), 2 (Pearson distance), 3 (Uncentered correlation distance, absolute value), 4 (Pearson distance, absolute value), 5 (Spearman's rank distance), 6 (Kendall's distance), 7 (Euclidean distance), 8 (City-block distance).

inputs.name: Remap method
inputs.description: Reassign clusters numbers based on METHOD: NONE (default), COUNT, iCOUNT, MAG, iMAG.

inputs.name: Cluster labels
inputs.description: Provide a label for each cluster. Labels cannot start with '-'.

inputs.name: Cluster initialization dataset
inputs.description: Specify a dataset to initialize clustering. If provided, sets -r 0.

inputs.name: Number of k-means runs
inputs.description: Number of times the k-means clustering algorithm is run.

inputs.name: Signatures file
inputs.description: Calculate distances from each voxel's signature to the signatures in this multi-column file. No clustering done.

inputs.name: Write distances
inputs.description: Output text files containing various distance measures.

inputs.name: Voxel debugging
inputs.description: Output debugging info for specified voxel (I J K).

inputs.name: Random seed
inputs.description: Seed for the random number generator. Default is 1234567.

output-files.name: Cluster membership volume
output-files.description: Output volume for the cluster membership.

output-files.name: Cluster distance volume
output-files.description: Output volume for the cluster distance measures.

output-files.name: Distances text file
output-files.description: Output text file containing distances between clusters.

output-files.name: Centroids text file
output-files.description: Output text file containing cluster centroids.

output-files.name: Within cluster sum text file
output-files.description: Output text file containing within cluster sum of distances.

output-files.name: Maximum distance within cluster text file
output-files.description: Output text file containing maximum distance within each cluster.

output-files.name: Voxel distance to centroid text file
output-files.description: Output text file containing distance from voxel to its centroid.
